GSD.product_version: versions from v4.9 to before v5.10.37
GSD.description:
bus: qcom: Put child node before return

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.37 by commit 00f6abd3509b1d70d0ab0fbe65ce5685cebed8be, it was introduced in version v4.9 by commit 335a127548081322bd2b294d715418648912f20c. For more details please see the references link.
